text: I sit down, I order a coffee with milk, the guy makes me repeat the order three times and he repeats it too to avoid any risk of error. He goes, passes my order on to a second guy, who writes it down in a notebook and passes it on to a third. Finally he comes back to a room and says, "Here it is", while he leaves a tin can on my table. But I said I'd ordered a coffee with milk. And well, that's it, he replies and leaves. FIN Situations I
title: Confusión
author: Jean-Paul Sartre
